scripts.test: npm run build && node lib/test local
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && npm i heroku-release
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:staging && npm run deploy:promote
scripts.deploy:staging: heroku-release publish --app esdiscuss-bot-staging && node lib/test staging
scripts.deploy:promote: heroku-release promote -p esdiscuss-bot -s esdiscuss-bot-staging -t esdiscuss-bot && node lib/test prod
